title: OT51: Alien Vs. Threadator
summary:
Key ideas:
- Bi-weekly visible open thread for general conversation and questions.
- "Hidden" open threads every Wednesday and Sunday under the "Open Thread" tab.
- Previous comments of the week include discussions on labor markets and political conversion stories.
- Author considering writing fewer but longer posts.

Key learnings:
- None explicitly stated.

Key questions:
